title: Retrieve Income Tax Crystallisation Obligations
description: An array to return one or more businesses and their obligations details.

periodStartDate.description: The start date of this obligation period. Date in the format YYYY-MM-DD.

periodEndDate.description: The end date of this obligation period. Date in the format YYYY-MM-DD.

dueDate.description: The due date for this obligation period. Date in the format YYYY-MM-DD.

status.description: The status of the obligation, one of: `Open` or `Fulfilled`.

receivedDate.description: The date this obligation period was fulfilled. Date in the format YYYY-MM-DD.
